description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; row of men in black coats and hats with hunched shoulders walking in a line diagonally across the image; in the background on both sides of the men are tall buildings tilted inward
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: 1) | BC of sheet, in pencil: Gogol : der Mantel. Sonderdrucke. 12 Lithographien / LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E 55-II Zür beabsichtigte neuauflage-H
portfolio: From Plate 1 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: BC in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18.
title: The Morning Way to the Office, Plate 1 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
